# Introduction

The Latent-Threshold VAR (or LTVAR) is a generalization of the Time-Varying Parameter VAR where some of estimated coefficients are shrunk to 0. In particular, the LTVAT-model can be represented as follows:

\[
y_t=b_tx_t+\epsilon_t
\]

with $b_t = \beta_t \dot$
